name: Transport Defender
description: Defend the transport ship from being captured by enemy waves on the way to the jump hole. Upgrade weapons, kill enemies, get cargo, transfer cargo, buy features, repeat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible, 512 MB Storage: 256 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible, 512 MB Storage: 256 MB available space
